job_history.work_description: Oversaw accounting functions of 30-person staff - accounts payable, accounts receivable, general accounting, taxes, payroll, and cash management. Finance lead for acquisition that grew company almost tenfold -Kimco Facility Services, LLC.
Direct report to executive team to solve acquisition issues and implement software & process improvements, including accounting procedures and customer work order processes.
Accounting manager for 10-person staff responsible for US accounting & payroll. Compiled $4M+ US month-end reporting and debt/stock management of 4 holding companies.
Oversaw accounting / budget / forecast / month end for 2 campuses, $30M+ in revenue. Led 15-20 person staff and multiple functional areas.
Analyzed & interpreted $2M+ monthly financial data, used for corporate board reporting. Created budget/forecast for Australian deal, assisted in setting up subsidiary company.
100M+ annual revenue; consolidated financials for 6 holding companies in 3 states. Processed monthly transactions for financial statements.

Controller for day-to-day accounting operations - led staff of 9. Compile $5M+ month-end reporting - general ledger, bank reconciliations, fuel cost, payroll acct for 750+ employees, month end variances (rents, landings, utilities).

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in overseeing accounting functions, managing financial reports, and leading staff in large corporations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has over two decades of experience in accounting, including general accounting, accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams of various sizes, including a 30-person staff, and has experience in managing multiple functional areas, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in analyzing and interpreting financial data, including creating budgets and forecasts, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing payroll for large numbers of employees, including 750+ employees, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has experience in creating budgets and forecasts for large corporations, including a $4M+ US month-end reporting, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has experience in compiling financial reports, including $5M+ month-end reporting, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing cash flow, including processing monthly transactions for financial statements, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Tax Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience in analyzing and interpreting tax data, including assisting in setting up a subsidiary company, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and payroll, suggesting strong proficiency.
